Entries.Dimitri: Woah...you got this for me?/64 104 287 575 746/Nice! Thanks/66 84 93 156 286 400/I don't like this at all.../-24 -26 -79 -75/This is just cruel. I don't want that./772 248 -7/Another year gone by, huh? Thanks for remembering my birthday!//

Entries.Dimitri0: Are you sure you still want to marry someone like me?#$b#You know I'd understand if you changed your mind, right?$2
Entries.Dimitri1: I'm going to eat so much tomorrow! I don't care if I get sick!$1

Entries.Dimitri: It's really cool how the end of something can be this beautiful.#$e#Can't say I'll miss the summer though.$1
Think Marlon will let me hop in the skeleton cage? I want to see something...

Entries.Bryson: Man, I really miss...eating! I miss eating!$4

Entries.spring_13: Do I look like someone who wants to run around looking for eggs with a bunch of kids?
Entries.spring_23: I wouldn't be caught dead at that flower dance.#$b#Even if it wasn't during the day, it's really lame.$3
Entries.summer_10: What's today? The Luau?#$b#I would actually go if I could. I used to love to eat.$2
Entries.summer_27: Keep an eye out for a purple jelly tomorrow for me, will you?$1
Entries.fall_15: I do kind of want to have my fortune told.$2#$e#It's probably pretty bleak anyway, though.$1
Entries.fall_26: Tomorrow is my favorite day of the year! I love Spirit's Eve!$1
Entries.winter_15: Listen, the night market is cool and all, but they always try to turn me into merchandise!$3#$b#I guess vampire stuff is rare.
Entries.winter_16: There's some pretty cool stuff here this year.$3
Entries.winter_17: Annnnd there's all of my savings for the year.#$b#Hope you found something good too!$1
Entries.winter_24: I should just stay home tomorrow...$2

Entries.15164302/f Dimitri 500/t 1800 2000:
Ghost Synth/75 11/farmer 75 12 0 Dimitri 78 2 2/skippable/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 200/move Dimitri 0 6 2/pause 500
                /speak Dimitri "Looks like you found my little inside joke for the circle.$6"/emote farmer 8/move Dimitri 0 4 0/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200
                /speak Dimitri "You know I was the first person to move here, right?$1#$b#Well, of the people who live there now.$1#$b#All the other families moved away a while ago.$3"/pause 200
                /faceDirection Dimitri 0/pause 500/speak Dimitri "The first thing I did when I moved here was change all the signs to say CindersNap instead of Cindersap.$6"/pause 200
                /emote farmer 40/faceDirection Dimitri 3/pause 200/speak Dimitri "What's that look for?$3#$b#Oh whatever, vandalism is not that serious. I've done so much worse.$4#b#I don't even know why I did it, to be honest...$9"/pause 500
                /speak Dimitri "It was so long ago...$2#$b#I guess I thought it was Cindersnap when I looked into moving here.$3#$b#And being wrong about that was just another thing to get on my nerves at the time.$2#$b#So I went and changed it myself!$7"/pause 500
                /faceDirection Dimitri 0/pause 200/speak Dimitri "It's kind of childish when I think about it now...$4#$b#But I was pretty angsty back then.$8"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/faceDirection Dimitri 3/speak Dimitri "Hm?#$b#Oh, well I was just angry a lot of the time, I guess.$3#$b#I had just...well, you know.$7#$b#I didn't take being a vampire very well when it first happened.$8"/pause 200
                /speak Dimitri "If you think I'm annoying now, you would have hated me back then.$6#$b#I basically terrorized everyone in Pelican town!$8"/pause 200
                /faceDirection Dimitri 2/pause 200/speak Dimitri "Things didn't really change until Bryson and Milo moved here.$3#$b#When they did, Milo was a lot different than he is now.$6#$b#We got into a huge fight!$4#$b#And then Bryson got involved and I ended up fighting with him too!#$b#...I didn't win that one.$8"/pause 500
                /emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak Dimitri "I think we were all going through a hard time...$2#$b#Eventually Bryson and I ended up bonding over how angry we always were!$6#$b#And now he's my best friend!$1"/pause 200
                /emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Dimitri "Whoops! That was a lot of information you didn't ask for, wasn't it? Sorry...$4#$b#I guess the point is that I was the one to change the signs!$1#$b#But don't worry, you don't have to fight me to be my friend anymore.$1#$b#I'm much calmer now!$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 200/speak Dimitri "I'll let you go now, though. I know you're busy.$1#$b#See you later, @!"
                /end dialogue Dimitri "Hey @. It was nice talking to you earlier!$1"

Entries.15164304/f Dimitri 1000/t 1200 2000:
Icicles/54 7/farmer 43 7 1 Dimitri 53 6 2 Bryson 55 6 2/skippable/pause 1000/speak Bryson "Hurry up, Dimitri!$3#$b#I want to see it again!$5"/pause 500
                /showFrame Dimitri 4/pause 500/showFrame Dimitri 0/addObject 54 8 156 1/jump Bryson 8/pause 100/pause 100/move farmer 8 0 1/emote farmer 8/pause 100/faceDirection Dimitri 3/pause 500/emote Dimitri 16
                /speak Dimitri "@, hey! I didn't hear you over there.$1"/pause 100/emote Bryson 40/speak Bryson "Some vampire...$1"/faceDirection Dimitri 2/pause 500/emote Dimitri 12/speak Dimitri "I wasn't even listening...$4#$b#Anyway, check out what we found in the mines!"
                /move Dimitri 0 1 2/speak Dimitri "It's some kind of weird fish.$9#$b#Cool right?$6"/emote farmer 28/faceDirection Dimitri 3/pause 100/speak Dimitri "What?$7#$b#It was already dead by the time we got back out here!$9#$b#It's not like I have a fish bowl in my jacket!$8"/pause 200
                /end dialogue Dimitri "Maybe one day I'll see you in the mines!$1"
